body.p: The entity settling a share‑based payment transaction when another entity in the group receives the goods or services shall recognise the transaction as an equity‑settled share‑based payment transaction only if it is settled in the entity’s own equity instruments. Otherwise, the transaction shall be recognised as a cash‑settled share‑based payment transaction.
